text: I’m assuming you’re referring to HubSpot Marketing Starter. Do you have any questions? we may be able to help reduce that confusion.

Hey everyone, we are a HubSpot partner in the UK and I'm looking for any advice on how other agencies structure their HubSpot CMS Development services. We would be looking to offer this to other partners a well as clients. Any advice welcome!
